targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le, instance) (rate(llm_request_prompt_tokens_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role=~"decode|"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by(le, instance) (rate(llm_request_prompt_tokens_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role=~"decode|"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, instance) (rate(llm_request_prompt_tokens_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role=~"decode|"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le, instance) (rate(llm_request_generation_tokens_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role=~"decode|"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by(le, instance) (rate(llm_request_generation_tokens_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role=~"decode|"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, instance) (rate(llm_request_generation_tokens_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role=~"decode|"}[$__rate_interval])))

(sum by(instance) (rate(llm_prefix_cache_hits_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role="prefill"}[$__rate_interval]) * 100)) / (sum by(instance) (rate(llm_prefix_cache_queries_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role="prefill"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Prefill prefix hit rate per Endpoint

targets.expr: (sum(rate(llm_prefix_cache_hits_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role="prefill"}[$__rate_interval]) * 100)) / (sum(rate(llm_prefix_cache_queries_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pool=~"$inference_pool", inference_service=~"$inference_service", role="prefill"}[$__rate_interval])))
